content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure is a colorful toy train or cityscape with approximately 20 blocks arranged in 2-3 layers.

## Spatial Relationships
- Base layer: Five red arch blocks (#1) arranged in a row form the foundation
- Middle layer contains:
  - Blue cube with orange triangular roof (forming a house)
  - Two yellow rectangular blocks standing vertically
  - Two yellow half-cylinders placed side by side
  - Orange house structure with triangular roof
  - Three green rectangular blocks placed in various positions
- Top layer has additional blocks stacked on the middle layer elements

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

1. Block #1 (Red arch block) - Used 5 times for the foundation
2. Block #2 (Blue cube) - Used 1 time for the house structure
3. Block #3 (Green cube) - Not used
4. Block #4 (Orange cube) - Not used
5. Block #5 (Green horizontal rectangle) - Used 1 time
6. Block #6 (Green horizontal rectangle) - Used 1 time
7. Block #7 (Green vertical rectangle) - Used 2 times
8. Block #8 (Yellow horizontal rectangle) - Not used
9. Block #9 (Yellow vertical rectangle) - Used 2 times
10. Block #10 (Yellow horizontal rectangle) - Not used
11. Block #11 (Yellow half-cylinder) - Used 2 times
12. Block #12 (Yellow small curved block) - Not used
13. Block #13 (Orange cube) - Used 1 time
14. Block #14 (Orange triangular roof) - Used 2 times
15. Block #15 (Orange triangular roof) - Not used
16. Block #16 (Orange triangular block) - Not used

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 1
   Step3: Move block with index 1
   Step4: Move block with index 1
   Step5: Move block with index 1
   Step6: Move block with index 7
   Step7: Move block with index 6
   Step8: Move block with index 7
   Step9: Move block with index 5
   Step10: Move block with index 2
   Step11: Move block with index 14
   Step12: Move block with index 9
   Step13: Move block with index 9
   Step14: Move block with index 11
   Step15: Move block with index 11
   Step16: Move block with index 13
   Step17: Move block with index 14
}
```
